title: A possible start to nerfing ADCs
body: This is just my take on the issue. Honestly I'm not sure how to fix their damage beyond just nerfing it but everyone knows that. But what if we made ADC's do less damage to towers and up AP laners auto damage to towers just a tad? This would reward grouping with the same amount of tower damage (towers being weak is a different issue) and also would make adcs less likely to just annihilate towers at level 4.

They could just undo every burst mage rework going back to Xerath, and put DF back int he game, and the game would be much better.

Xerath original rework or MYMU rework?

In both cases I actually like the changes overall (still miss original Xerath W though).
Original. The original Xerath was a counter to marksman since the rework he's not.

Original he could almost replace marksman in teamfights.  His free magic pen made him able to destroy literally the entire enemy team with his ults and Q.

As for specifically the enemy adc, it's tough for me to say.  Yes the old one was able to stun them much more reliably, but the new one is capable of killing them from half way across the map.  New is less reliable but greater potential (also less ult reliant).

Idk though, I reeeally want old Xerath W put in the game on a champion.  That was by far my favorite part of his kit back then.

Simply increasing the AP ratio mid laners get against turrets, or even allowing some of their spells to damage turrets, could be a big step towards allowing classes other than the ADC to push more consistently. I feel that, to some degree, it's pretty hypocritical to justify the current mandatory status of marksmen because they're apparently the only class capable of truly pushing towers, when there is a) an artificial restriction imposed on structures that prevents most AP champions from using their greatest asset against them, despite allowing marksmen to use their own abilities to push harder, and b) an actual ratio in place to allow AP champion to push, which is still being kept so low that marksmen eclipse them at all stages. Some parts of the game do favor autoattacks, but only because they've been forced that way, and I feel there are a great deal many things that shouldn't be autoattack-exclusive (making wards take damage from abilities could help non-marksmen clear them faster, for example, and many monsters could have their MR drastically reduced to let casters kill them more consistently).

So many bad ideas about a role that is working as intended. 

NO NERFS NEEDED.   

People learning to counter however.......
